MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
AxiomCoders is a leading provider of computer software, currently specializing in office and networking software. We are simply the company that creates something different and innovating, taking widely accepted software ideas and adding unique flavor to all of them. By checking our software products you will see how software can be made just for you.
Currently our focus is set on PDF Report Generator software and developer components for generating PDF files. We deliver PDF tools for both developers and end users giving them simplicity and good quality. 50% of the product is in its support and maintenance and we are aware of that giving all our customers and future customers good support. We let our users pave the road where they want to see our products.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer: This is .NET component. Please use demo project included in installer or check PDF file examples on www.axiomcoders.com web site.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: PDF Report Generator component for C#, ASP.NET, VB.NET, also as Win32/Win64 dll
Site.Site_Description_250: AxiomCoders PDF Report Generator is complete solution used for generating reports. .NET component or Win32/Win64 dll component are available. Easy integration in just 6 lines of code. Powerful report editor. Accepts any .NET object as data source.
Site.Site_Description_450: AxiomCoders PDF Report Generator is complete solution used for generating reports. .NET component or Win32/Win64 dll components are available. Easy integration in just 6 lines of code. Powerful report editor. Accepts any .NET object as data source. Data source for your reports can be database, hardware devices, network, etc. If you want to have PDF generated catalogs, professional looking price-lists, menus, invoices, etc.
Site.Site_Keywords: PDF report generator, PDF component, C# PDF, report net PDF, PDF generator, vb.net PDF, generate PDF file, asp .net PDF, asp .net PDF report

Program_Info.Limitations: Unlimited trial perdiod during which PDF files will contain appropriate "This is DEMO" watermark.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: The trial version of AxiomCoders PDF Reports can be freely distributed over the internet in an unchanged form.

Press_Release.Press_Release: AxiomCoders releases PDF Report Generator PDF Report Generator is reporting solutions used for generating PDF files. Its comprehensive design allows you to generate PDF files directly from your .NET objects by also giving you the power to really design your PDF files. In cases when you need PDF file produced by your application, you don't want to manually fill it, this component will provide you with the quickest possible way to do that. It comes as .NET component and also as Win32/Win64 DLL library and also can be used as ASP .NET component. The report generating process implemented in our component is completely different from what is currently on the market and will give power to developers to have better control on generating process. Data source for PDF Report Generator can be anything ranging from databases to hardware device input data. Ability to have color gradients, background images, different shapes and full control how your report is being generated is something new and different. Considering available support on this product for all of our users (both real customers and normal ones), our prices and simplicity to use, this component stands out as "Best Value for Money" PDF reporting component. Product features with some nice examples can be checked here http://www.axiomcoders.com/products/pdf-report-generator
Press_Release.Press_Release_Plain:
AxiomCoders releases PDF Report Generator
PDF Report Generator is reporting solutions used for generating PDF files. Its comprehensive design allows you to generate PDF files directly from your .NET objects by also giving you the power to really design your PDF files. In cases when you need PDF file produced by your application, you don't want to manually fill it, this component will provide you with the quickest possible way to do that. It comes as .NET component and also as Win32/Win64 DLL library and also can be used as ASP .NET component.
The report generating process implemented in our component is completely different from what is currently on the market and will give power to developers to have better control on generating process. Data source for PDF Report Generator can be anything ranging from databases to hardware device input data.
Ability to have color gradients, background images, different shapes and full control how your report is being generated is something new and different. Considering available support on this product for all of our users (both real customers and normal ones), our prices and simplicity to use, this component stands out as "Best Value for Money" PDF reporting component.
Product features with some nice examples can be checked here http://www.axiomcoders.com/products/pdf-report-generator
Press_Release.Headline: PDF Report Generator is release by AxiomCoders
Press_Release.Summary: PDF Report Generator is reporting solutions used for generating PDF files. It will great improve process of creating PDF files allowing you to use anything as data source. It is good for creating price lists, invoices, product catalogs, etc.
Press_Release.Keywords: PDF report generator, PDF component, C# PDF, report net PDF, PDF generator, vb.net PDF, generate PDF file, asp .net PDF, asp .net PDF report

English.Char_Desc_450: AxiomCoders PDF Report Generator is complete solution used for generating reports. .NET component or Win32/Win64 dll components are available. Easy integration in just 6 lines of code. Powerful report editor. Accepts any .NET object as data source. Data source for your reports can be database, hardware devices, network, etc. If you want to have PDF generated catalogs, professional looking price-lists, menus, invoices, etc.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
AxiomCoders PDF Report Generator is complete solution used for generating reports. Major things you need to know about this PDF component:
- .NET component or Win32/Win64 dll components are available - Works on C#, VB.NET, ASP.NET, VB 6, C++, C, ... - Easy integration in just 6 lines of code (event driven or direct usage of objects) - Powerful FREE report editor - Unlimited trial period - Accepts any .NET object as data source - Data source for your reports can be database, hardware devices, network, etc. - If you want to have PDF generated catalogs, professional looking price-lists, menus, invoices or any other kind of report
Who needs PDF Report Generator?
- Software Developers looking for .NET or Win 32 (dll) component that can be used to generate PDF files - Software Developers who are looking to generate PDF files but without manual coding of PDF file - Companies that produce software and want to add professional look to their reports or they found limitations in existing reporting solutions - Software Developers who are looking to enhance their products by ability to generate reports
When do I need PDF Report Generator?
- If you want to give your .NET application (Console, Web, UI) power to generate PDF files from any kind of input data and want your reports to have some professional design. Input data can be database, hardware devices, etc - If you have C#, C/C++, Delphi, Visual Basic 6, etc. application that you want to give power to generate reports in PDF format from any kind of input data - If you want to design catalogs, professional looking price-lists, menus, etc. and you want them to look like designer actually put a hand on it
